reactor.io.codec

Class Codec<SRC,IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.io.codec.Codec<SRC,IN,OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    SRC - The type that the codec decodes from and encodes to
    IN - The type produced by decoding
    OUT - The type consumed by encoding
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<OUT,SRC>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ByteArrayCodec, CompressionCodec, DelimitedCodec, FrameCodec, JavaSerializationCodec, JsonCodec, LengthFieldCodec, PassThroughCodec, SerializationCodec, StringCodec, SyslogCodec

    public abstract class Codec<SRC,IN,OUT>
extends Object
implements Function<OUT,SRC>
    Implementations of a Codec are responsible for decoding a SRC into an instance of IN and passing that to the given Consumer. A codec also provides an encoder to take an instance of OUT and encode to an instance of SRC.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin, Stephane Maldini

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte DEFAULT_DELIMITER 
      protected Byte delimiter 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Codec()
      Create a new Codec set with a \0 delimiter to finish any Buffer encoded value or scan for delimited decoded Buffers.
      Codec(Byte delimiter)
      A delimiter can be used to trail any decoded buffer or to finalize encoding from any incoming value

    • Constructor Detail

      • Codec

        public Codec()
        Create a new Codec set with a \0 delimiter to finish any Buffer encoded value or scan for delimited decoded Buffers.

      • Codec

        public Codec(Byte delimiter)
        A delimiter can be used to trail any decoded buffer or to finalize encoding from any incoming value
        Parameters:
        delimiter - delimiter can be left undefined (null) to bypass appending at encode time and scanning at decode time.

    • Method Detail

      • decoder

        public Function<SRC,IN> decoder()
        Provide the caller with a decoder to turn a source object into an instance of the input type.
        Returns:
        The decoded object.

      • decoder

        public abstract Function<SRC,IN> decoder(Consumer<IN> next)
        Provide the caller with a decoder to turn a source object into an instance of the input type.
        Parameters:
        next - The Consumer to call after the object has been decoded.
        Returns:
        The decoded object.

      • encoder

        public Function<OUT,SRC> encoder()
        Provide the caller with an encoder to turn an output object into an instance of the source type.
        Returns:
        The encoded source object.

      • doDelimitedBufferDecode

        protected IN doDelimitedBufferDecode(Consumer<IN> decoderCallback,
                                     Buffer buffer)
        Helper method to scan for delimiting byte the codec might benefit from, e.g. JSON codec. A DelimitedCodec or alike will obviously not require to make use of that helper as it is already delimiting.
        Parameters:
        decoderCallback -
        buffer -
        Returns:
        a value if no callback is supplied and there is only one delimited buffer

        Returns:

      • addDelimiterIfAny

        protected Buffer addDelimiterIfAny(Buffer buffer)
        Add a trailing delimiter if defined
        Parameters:
        buffer - the buffer to prepend to this codec delimiter if any
        Returns:
        the positioned and expanded buffer reference if any delimiter, otherwise the passed buffer
